html:
2025-0824
2025-11-27FINBank of Canada ActAppointment of a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of CanadaApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of Chantal Frappier of Brossard, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 29, 2028, in the place of Carlos Leitao, who has resigned.N/A
subject: Appointment of a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of Chantal Frappier of Brossard, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 29, 2028, in the place of Carlos Leitao, who has resigned.
